DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety profile , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics follow single multiple ascend oral dos BMS-986195 healthy subject , assess relative bioavailability two formulation BMS-986195 without food .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Relative Bioavailability Study BMS-986195 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: For information regard BristolMyers Squibb Clinical Trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 32 kilograms/meter^2 Healthy male female , first generation Japanese confirm paternal maternal Japanese ancestry , 1855 year old , whose residency outside Japan exceed 10 year BMI 1830 kilograms/meter^2 inclusive . Women must pregnant breastfeed Women Childbearing Potential ( WOCBP ) must agree follow instruction method ( ) contraception duration treatment study drug plus 14 day longer require . Males sexually active WOCBP must agree follow instruction method ( ) contraception duration treatment study drug plus 14 day longer require . Any significant acute chronic medical illness Known suspect autoimmune disorder , include limited rheumatoid arthritis , fibromyalgia , systemic lupus erythematosis , polymyalgia rheumatica , giant cell arteritis , Behcet 's disease , dermatomyositis , multiple sclerosis , moderate severe asthma , autoimmune vasculitis , autoimmune hepatitis , active autoimmune disease subject require medical followup medical treatment Any history know suspected congenital acquire immunodeficiency state condition would compromise subject 's immune status ( example : history splenectomy ) Presence factor would predispose subject develop infection e.g. , rectal fissure , poor dentition , open skin lesion , presence preexist skin condition increase risk injection site complication e.g . Behcet 's Disease , Psoriasis , pustular dermatosis Any history risk tuberculosis ( TB ) Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion could apply
